mapper.select: SELECT CUS_NUM , CUS_ID , CUS_PWD , CUS_NAME , CUS_GENDER , CUS_EMAIL , CUS_ADDR , CUS_TEL, CUS_BIRTH , CUS_DELIV_ADDR , CUS_POINT , CUS_REGDATE FROM CUSTOMER WHERE CUS_ID = #{CUS_ID}

select ORDERS.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDNAME, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDSIZE, ORDERS.ORDER_PRICE, ORDERS.ORDER_STATE, ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE, ORDERS.ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVCOMP, ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVNUM, ORDER_USEPOINT, PRODUCT.PRD_BRAND, PRODUCT.PRD_IMAGE from ORDERS join PRODUCT on ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE=PRODUCT.PRD_CODE where ORDERS.ORDER_CUSID= #{ID} order by ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE desc, ORDERS.ORDER_NUM desc limit #{page},20;

select ORDERS.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDNAME, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDSIZE, ORDERS.ORDER_PRICE, ORDERS.ORDER_STATE, ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE, ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE, ORDERS.ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVCOMP, ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVNUM, ORDER_USEPOINT, PRODUCT.PRD_BRAND, PRODUCT.PRD_IMAGE from ORDERS join PRODUCT on ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE=PRODUCT.PRD_CODE where ORDERS.ORDER_CUSID= #{ID} and ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE >= #{date1} and ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE < DATE_add(#{date2},INTERVAL 1 Day) order by ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE desc, ORDERS.ORDER_NUM desc limit #{page},20;
select count(*) from ORDERS where ORDER_CUSID = #{ID} and ORDER_STATE = #{STATE};
select count(*) from ORDERS where ORDER_CUSID = #{ID} and ORDER_REGDATE >= #{date1} and ORDER_REGDATE < DATE_add(#{date2},INTERVAL 1 Day) and ORDER_STATE = #{STATE};
select count(*) from ORDERS where ORDER_CUSID = #{ID};
select count(*) from ORDERS where ORDER_CUSID = #{ID} and ORDER_REGDATE >= #{date1} and ORDER_REGDATE < DATE_add(#{date2},INTERVAL 1 Day);

select ORDERS.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS.ORDER_CUSID , ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE , ORDERS.ORDER_PRDNAME , ORDERS.ORDER_PRDSIZE , ORDERS.ORDER_AMOUNT , ORDERS.ORDER_RECEIVER , ORDERS.ORDER_TEL , ORDERS.ORDER_ADDR , ORDERS.ORDER_PRICE , ORDERS.ORDER_STATE , ORDERS.ORDER_MEMO , ORDERS.ORDER_REGDATE , ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVCOMP , ORDERS.ORDER_DELIVNUM , ORDERS.ORDER_USEPOINT , PRODUCT.PRD_NUM , PRODUCT.PRD_CODE , PRODUCT.PRD_NAME , PRODUCT.PRD_CATEGORY , PRODUCT.PRD_IMAGE , PRODUCT.PRD_PRICE , PRODUCT.PRD_BRAND , PRODUCT.PRD_DISRATE from ORDERS join PRODUCT on ORDERS.ORDER_PRDCODE=PRODUCT.PRD_CODE where ORDER_NUM = #{value}
select count(*) from product join JJIM on JJIM.JJIM_PRDNUM = product.PRD_NUM where JJIM.JJIM_CUSID = #{ID};
select QNA_NUM, PRD_NUM , QNA_LOCK , QNA_CUSID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , QNA_REGDATE from QNA where QNA_CUSID = #{ID} limit #{page},20;

select QNA_NUM, PRD_NUM , QNA_LOCK , QNA_CUSID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , QNA_REGDATE from QNA where QNA_CUSID = #{ID} and QNA_REGDATE >= #{date1} and QNA_REGDATE < DATE_add(#{date2},INTERVAL 1 Day) order by QNA_REGDATE desc limit #{page},20;
select PRD_CODE , PRD_NAME , PRD_BRAND , PRD_IMAGE from product where PRD_NUM = #{value};
select count(*) from QNA where QNA_CUSID = #{ID};
select count(*) from QNA where QNA_CUSID = #{ID} and QNA_REGDATE >= #{date1} and QNA_REGDATE < DATE_add(#{date2},INTERVAL 1 Day) ;
select count(*) from customer where CUS_ID = #{ID} and CUS_PWD = #{PASSWORD};
